$interpreted: Lazer: That's enough. Let's try sparring.
Lazer: Barely satisfactory. You're not focused. Does it hurt where she hit you?
Lazer: Don't try to hide it. I saw it all.
Lazer: It's because of the servant, isn't it?
Diana: ...After the lady heard of what happened to Lucy, she was devastated. She cried until her eyes swelled up. Today it was arranged for her to have her family portrait drawn.
Diana: ...Her reaction was so much different from mine.
Lazer: She is a noble. She has the right to be compassionate.
Lazer: You understand...so do you feel wronged?
Diana: Those words last night, they weren't mine. They were the lady's own words. Diana Juan Gomez should be dead already.
Diana: And I...I...there's nowhere for me to go. I belong nowhere.
Lazer: It's just a mirage, a wish that will never be fulfilled. So just relax, and wish for whatever you please.
Lazer: You have a name. Diana.
Diana: That is my lady's name. I'm merely borrowing it for the time being. I want...my own name.
Lazer: Do you see the mirage that lies before you?
Lazer: You are an illusion. You do not exist. You do not need a name.
Lazer: I didn't say that either.
Lazer: It may be fake, but whoever lays there eyes upon it will have hope.
Lazer: That is what we are.
Diana: I've always wanted to ask...before...did I know you, teacher?
Diana: Eh!? I already...when did it...?
Lazer: It's still quite easy to spot imperfections on you.
Lazer: ...In the Kingdom of the Sun, the one who chooses a name for a newborn is called Godfather. He may take the place of a mother or father.
Lazer: That is to say...you are no longer an orphan.
Lazer: Mmm...I shall take my leave first.
Lazer: Are you coming or what?

I've always wanted to ask...before...did I know you, teacher?
It's still quite easy to spot imperfections on you.
...In the Kingdom of the Sun, the one who chooses a name for a newborn is called Godfather. He may take the place of a mother or father.
That is to say...you are no longer an orphan.
Mmm...I shall take my leave first.
